net.uniform.api

Interface TranslationEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleTranslationEngine

    public interface TranslationEngine

    This class is responsible of translating text resources inside any Uniform class. It's necessary for translating validation messages, labels... It is accessed through the TranslationEngineContext class.

    The translation engine tries to find the translation in the current locale, and use the default locale (english) if the resource is missing.

    Like Spring Framework's LocaleContextHolder, it holds a Locale instance with the current thread. The Locale will be inherited by any child threads spawned by the current thread.

    Java MessageFormat formatting should be used in all resources.

    Author:
    Eduardo Ramos
